languages.text: "Не ты ли принял{mf||а} меня обратно, элантах? Зачем?" {n}Смесь ярости и стыда озаряют лицо Ирлиэт, и она почти шипит сквозь зубы.{/n} "А... теперь я вижу. Обида стиснула твое сердце ядовитой змеей, и ты не смог{mf||ла} ее укротить. Или просто не захотел{mf||а}. В таком случае... Нам не о чем более разговаривать".

traits.locale_text: "Не ты ли принял{mf||а} меня обратно, элантах? Зачем?" {n}Смесь ярости и стыда озаряют лицо Ирлиэт, и она почти шипит сквозь зубы.{/n} "А... теперь я вижу. Обида стиснула твое сердце ядовитой змеей, и ты не смог{mf||ла} ее укротить. Или просто не захотел{mf||а}. В таком случае... Нам не о чем более разговаривать".

languages.text: "Were you not the one who welcomed me back, elantach? Why?" {n}Yrliet's face is flushed with anger and shame, almost making her hiss.{/n} "Ah... I see it now. The resentment wrapped around your heart like a venomous snake, and you were powerless to tame it. Or simply chose not to. In that case... we have nothing more to discuss."
languages.original_text: "Не ты ли принял{mf||а} меня обратно, элантах? Зачем?" {n}Смесь ярости и стыда озаряют лицо Ирлиэт, и она почти шипит сквозь зубы.{/n} "А... теперь я вижу. Обида стиснула твое сердце ядовитой змеей, и ты не смог{mf||ла} ее укротить. Или просто не захотел{mf||а}. В таком случае... Нам не о чем более разговаривать".

The resentment wrapped around your heart like a venomous snake, and you were powerless to tame it. Or simply chose not to. In this case... We have nothing else to discuss."

The resentment wrapped around your heart like a venomous snake, and you were powerless to tame it. Or simply chose not to. In this case... We have nothing else to discuss."

The resentment wrapped around your heart like a venomous snake, and you were powerless to tame it. Or simply chose not to. In that case... we have nothing more to discuss."

"Were you not the one who welcomed me back, elantach? Why?" {n}Yrliet's face is flushed with anger and shame, almost making her hiss.{/n} "Ah... I see it now. The resentment wrapped around your heart like a venomous snake, and you were powerless to tame it. Or simply chose not to. In that case... we have nothing more to discuss."

languages.text: «¿No fuiste tú quien me recibió con los brazos abiertos, elantach? ¿Por qué?». {n}Yrliet se ruboriza de ira y vergüenza; casi parece a punto de bufar.{/n} «Ah... ahora lo entiendo. El resentimiento se enroscó en torno a tu corazón, como una serpiente ponzoñosa, y fuiste incapaz de dominarte. O más bien no quisiste hacerlo. En ese caso... ya no tenemos nada más de lo que hablar».
languages.original_text: "Were you not the one who welcomed me back, elantach? Why?" {n}Yrliet's face is flushed with anger and shame, almost making her hiss.{/n} "Ah... I see it now. The resentment wrapped around your heart like a venomous snake, and you were powerless to tame it. Or simply chose not to. In that case... we have nothing more to discuss."

traits.locale_text: «¿No fuiste tú quien me recibió con los brazos abiertos, elantach? ¿Por qué?». {n}Yrliet se ruboriza de ira y vergüenza; casi parece a punto de bufar.{/n} «Ah... ahora lo entiendo. El resentimiento se enroscó en torno a tu corazón, como una serpiente ponzoñosa, y fuiste incapaz de dominarte. O más bien no quisiste hacerlo. En ese caso... ya no tenemos nada más de lo que hablar».

languages.text: “可欢迎我回来的人，不正是你吗？外界人？为什么？”{n}伊莉耶特因愤怒和羞愧涨红了脸，几乎发出了嘶嘶声。{/n}“啊……我现在明白了。因为怨恨像毒蛇一样缠绕着你的心，而你却无力驯服它，或是不愿驯服它。既然这样……那我们没什么可谈的了。”
languages.original_text: "Were you not the one who welcomed me back, elantach? Why?" {n}Yrliet's face is flushed with anger and shame, almost making her hiss.{/n} "Ah... I see it now. The resentment wrapped around your heart like a venomous snake, and you were powerless to tame it. Or simply chose not to. In that case... we have nothing more to discuss."

traits.locale_text: “可欢迎我回来的人，不正是你吗？外界人？为什么？”{n}伊莉耶特因愤怒和羞愧涨红了脸，几乎发出了嘶嘶声。{/n}“啊……我现在明白了。因为怨恨像毒蛇一样缠绕着你的心，而你却无力驯服它，或是不愿驯服它。既然这样……那我们没什么可谈的了。”

languages.text: « Pourtant, vous m'avez de nouveau accueillie à vos côtés, elantach. Pourquoi ? » {n}Yrliet rougit de honte et de colère. Elle retient à peine un sifflement de frustration.{/n} « Ah... Je comprends, maintenant. Le ressentiment qui a enserré votre cœur tel un serpent venimeux et vous n'avez rien pu faire pour le dompter... ou vous avez tout simplement choisi de ne pas le faire. Dans ce cas... nous n'avons plus rien à nous dire. »
languages.original_text: "Were you not the one who welcomed me back, elantach? Why?" {n}Yrliet's face is flushed with anger and shame, almost making her hiss.{/n} "Ah... I see it now. The resentment wrapped around your heart like a venomous snake, and you were powerless to tame it. Or simply chose not to. In that case... we have nothing more to discuss."

traits.locale_text: « Pourtant, vous m'avez de nouveau accueillie à vos côtés, elantach. Pourquoi, dans ce cas ? » {n}Yrliet rougit de honte et de colère. Elle retient à peine un sifflement de frustration.{/n} « Ah... Je comprends, maintenant. Le ressentiment qui a enserré votre cœur tel un serpent venimeux et vous n'avez rien pu faire pour le dompter... ou vous avez tout simplement choisi de ne pas le faire. Dans ce cas, nous n'avons plus rien à nous dire. »

languages.text: 「エランタ、あなたは私を歓迎してくれたのではなかったか？どうしてだ？」{n}ユリエットの顔は怒りと羞恥で赤らんでいる。{/n}「ああ…今わかった。恨みが毒蛇のようにあなたの心にまとわりつき、あなたはそれを飼いならすことができなかった。あるいは、飼いならさないことにしたというわけだ。ならば…もう議論の余地はない」
languages.original_text: "Were you not the one who welcomed me back, elantach? Why?" {n}Yrliet's face is flushed with anger and shame, almost making her hiss.{/n} "Ah... I see it now. The resentment wrapped around your heart like a venomous snake, and you were powerless to tame it. Or simply chose not to. In that case... we have nothing more to discuss."

traits.locale_text: 「エランタ、あなたは私を歓迎してくれたのではなかったか？どうしてだ？」{n}ユリエットの顔は怒りと羞恥で赤らんでいる。{/n}「ああ…今わかった。恨みが毒蛇のようにあなたの心にまとわりつき、あなたはそれを飼いならすことができなかった。あるいは、飼いならさないことにしたというわけだ。ならば…もう議論の余地はない」

languages.text: "Wart Ihr es nicht, {mf|der|die} mich wieder willkommen geheißen hat, Elantach? Warum?" {n}Yrliets Gesicht ist rot vor Zorn und Schande, fast zischt sie.{/n} "Ah ... Jetzt verstehe ich. Der Groll hat sich um Euer Herz gelegt wie eine giftige Schlange, und Ihr wart machtlos, ihn zu zähmen. Oder habt schlicht entschieden, es nicht zu tun. Wenn das so ist ... Haben wir nichts weiter zu besprechen."
languages.original_text: "Were you not the one who welcomed me back, elantach? Why?" {n}Yrliet's face is flushed with anger and shame, almost making her hiss.{/n} "Ah... I see it now. The resentment wrapped around your heart like a venomous snake, and you were powerless to tame it. Or simply chose not to. In that case... we have nothing more to discuss."

traits.locale_text: "Wart Ihr es nicht, {mf|der|die} mich wieder willkommen geheißen hat, Elantach? Warum?" {n}Yrliets Gesicht ist rot vor Zorn und Schande, fast zischt sie.{/n} "Ah ... Jetzt verstehe ich. Der Groll hat sich um Euer Herz gelegt wie eine giftige Schlange, und Ihr wart machtlos, ihn zu zähmen. Oder habt schlicht entschieden, es nicht zu tun. Wenn das so ist ... Haben wir nichts weiter zu besprechen."

languages.text: "Beni yeniden maiyetine alan sen değil miydin elantach? Neden?" {n}Yrliet'in yüzü, öfke ve utançla kıpkırmızı oluyor. Neredeyse tıslayacak gibi duruyor.{/n} "Hah... Şimdi anladım. Kinin, yüreğinin etrafını zehirli bir yılan gibi sarmış ve senin de onu evcilleştirmeye ya gücün yetmiyor ya da evcilleştiresin yok. O hâlde... Konuşacak başka bir şeyimiz kalmadı."
languages.original_text: "Were you not the one who welcomed me back, elantach? Why?" {n}Yrliet's face is flushed with anger and shame, almost making her hiss.{/n} "Ah... I see it now. The resentment wrapped around your heart like a venomous snake, and you were powerless to tame it. Or simply chose not to. In that case... we have nothing more to discuss."

Kinin, yüreğinin etrafını zehirli bir yılan gibi sarmış ve senin de onu evcilleştirmeye ya gücün yetmiyor ya da evcilleştiresin yok. O hâlde... Konuşacak başka bir şeyimiz kalmadı."
